## Introducing Iris

Build custom Video AI Agents and act on insights – all through natural conversation.

[Learn more](https://www.spot.ai/iris)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/67f4bc06c82dda32c0d0d435_Frame%205089.avif)

## Why customers choose Spot AI

### 40% reduction in workplace injuries

Pinpoint causes, boost training, and stay ahead with predictive alerts.

![homepage-outcomes-missing_ppe@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/671ba1c65b29d27396b536a5_homepage-outcomes-missing_ppe%402x.avif)

![homepage-outcomes-fence_jump@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/671ba170a7861d647dbabda4_homepage-outcomes-fence_jump%402x.avif)

### 80% faster incident resolution

Swiftly resolve and prevent with streamlined AI-powered workflows.

### 15% more throughput

Identify bottlenecks, accelerate performance, and drive accountability across sites.

![ai_agents-outcomes-unattended_kiosk](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/671e5ee6d32860e4fb9578ae_ai_agents-outcomes-unattended_kiosk%402x.avif)

## Future-proof your organization

### Plug-and-play cameras

Plug in any IP cameras you already have — or get cameras from us. Most customers are up and running within minutes.

![homepage-features-cameras@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/6712b32814a18906d2440152_homepage-features-cameras%402x.webp)

![homepage-features-open_ecosystem@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/6712b3288ce642eb37a5bdf7_homepage-features-open_ecosystem%402x.webp)

### Open ecosystem

Integrate any third-party software or sensor technology with Spot AI to connect your existing workflows with video data and insights.

### State-of-the-art Video AI

We build specialized video foundational models trained with precision and optimized for real-world use cases.

![homepage-features-video_ai@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/67103bbf221276cdb75981fd_homepage-features-video_ai%402x.webp)

![ai-agents-dark](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/67065773de6b80061d0ee1d5_ai-bg-dark.avif)

## Your Video AI platform

![Spot AI Camera System](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/66334d8b6b8fd80cf5d65b25_homepage-camera_system%402x-min.avif)![product-mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/670e43edabb4626493f60f64_product-mobile.avif)![ivr-mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/635c19a6c36c8d0438731f98_ivr-mobile.svg)![ivr-mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/635c19a6c36c8d0438731f98_ivr-mobile.svg)![ivr-mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/635c19a6c36c8d0438731f98_ivr-mobile.svg)

IP Cameras

Premium, high resolution, NDAA compli

![illustration-spot-overview-features-business-applications@2x 1@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/63493f08da60b32ad8664cec_illustration-spot-overview-features-business-applications%402x%201%402x.avif)

## Create a safer and smarter physical world with the power of sight.

The physical world of business is complex. Problems surface and things break, often by surprise. And suddenly, a smooth day turns into a frantic fire fight, and your business comes to a halt.

Finding and solving problems requires visual context. Seeing is 90% of sensory perception. Seeing is knowing.

We help shed light on your physical world, on every floor and every corner. So you can see, understand and manage your business. So you can keep your business moving.

XX

Locations Installed

XX

Locations Installed

XX

Locations Installed

## Deployed at thousands of locations across the U.S. and trusted by leaders across industries — from local businesses to Fortune 500s.

![spot-ai-about-us-map@2x@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/6148003bd12a71003a9a592a_spot-ai-about-us-map%402x%402x.avif)![about-us-map-full@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/614d7a9270b0d3199195f8c5_about-us-map-full%402x.avif)

## Founders

In 2018, three friends from Stanford — Tanuj, Rish and Sud — asked a simple question: Why isn’t video footage more widely used in the enterprise? They started Spot AI with a vision that businesses could leverage their video footage to improve not only security, but also efficiency, safety and customer experiences.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83ccd437fefc04/614b5b60ee274e7ac7ecec4a_tanuj-thapliyal-spot-ai-ceo-128px%402x.png)\\
\\
**Tanuj Thapliyal** \\
\\
Executive Chairman & Co-Founder](https://www.spot.ai/about-us#)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83ccd437fefc04/614b5b729e65736df761c041_rish-gupta-spot-ai-vp-product-128px%402x.png)\\
\\
**Rish Gupta** \\
\\
CEO & Co-Founder](https://www.spot.ai/about-us#)

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83ccd437fefc04/614b5b892334e165e8547261_sud-bhatija-spot-ai-vp-growth-128px%402x.png)\\
\\
**Sud Bhatija** \\
\\
CGO & Co-Founder](https://www.spot.ai/about-us#)

## Investors

We’re backed by venture capitalists and angel investors who’ve backed IT companies like Snowflake, Looker, Arista and Pure Storage.

![spot-ai-and-redpoint-ventures-2-x@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/614719a43e33438e40c1cf8a_spot-ai-and-redpoint-ventures-2-x%402x.avif)![spot-ai-and-bessemer-venture-partners-2-x@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/61471983b7f7db1c4901b314_spot-ai-and-bessemer-venture-partners-2-x%402x.avif)![spot-ai-and-village-global-2-x@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/614719bf03b6b876ea9eda79_spot-ai-and-village-global-2-x%402x.avif)![spot-ai-and-stanford-startx-fund-2-x@2x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/614719ce2581ed9a2186f979_spot-ai-and-stanford-startx-fund-2-x%402x.avif)

## Team

Our team at Spot AI comes from all corners of the world and with diverse backgrounds. We’re obsessed with creating great customer experiences. We love what we do and the people we get to spend time with every day.

### HQ - Bay Area

San Francisco, California

![HQ - Bay Area](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/5fe29886dd790a0c94706f99_bay%20area_spot%20locations.svg)

Lehi, Utah

![sales](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/5fe2988de219d013afcfb09a_lehi%20utah_spot%20locations.svg)

Remote - work from anywhere!

![all-team](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fe2250e2f83cc02cbfefbcf/5fe298938d8b2bb37dd2282b_remote%20work_spot%20locations.svg)

### Let’s do great things together. Join our team.

[See open positions](https://boards.greenhouse.io/spotai)

perplexity_research.content:
Here is a structured, actionable sales prospecting report for **Spot AI** in the **Camera Security** industry based on available information and logical inferences:

---

### Company Overview
- **What they do:** Spot AI develops AI-powered camera security solutions that leverage artificial intelligence to enhance video surveillance, automate monitoring, and provide actionable insights.
- **Headquarters:** Likely based in the United States (common for AI security startups; exact location not publicly confirmed).
- **Size:** Estimated small to mid-size company with likely under 200 employees, typical for AI-driven security tech startups. Revenue data is not publicly available but likely in early growth phase given industry and product maturity.

### Products & Services
- **Key offerings:** AI-enabled security cameras and video analytics platforms designed to improve security monitoring efficiency.
- **Pricing models:** Likely subscription-based SaaS model combined with hardware sales or leasing, common in camera security industry.
- **Unique features & differentiators:**
  - Advanced AI algorithms for real-time threat detection and event recognition.
  - Cloud-based video storage and analytics.
  - Integration capabilities with existing security infrastructure.
  - Focus on reducing false alarms and manual monitoring workload.

### Pain Points
- **Industry challenges:**
  - Increasing demand for smarter, automated surveillance due to rising security threats.
  - High operational costs and inefficiencies in traditional video monitoring.
  - Need for scalable solutions that integrate with legacy systems.
- **Market shifts:**
  - Growing adoption of AI and cloud technologies in security.
  - Regulatory pressures on data privacy and video surveillance.
- **Operational inefficiencies:**
  - Manual video review is time-consuming and error-prone.
  - Difficulty in extracting actionable insights from large volumes of video data.

### Competitive Landscape
- **Main competitors:**
  - Established players like Verkada, Eagle Eye Networks, and Avigilon.
  - Emerging AI-focused startups in video security.
- **Positioning:**
  - Spot AI likely competes by emphasizing superior AI accuracy and ease of integration.
  - May target mid-market enterprises looking to upgrade legacy systems with AI-driven solutions.
  - Differentiates through advanced analytics and possibly better pricing flexibility.

### Recent Developments
- No publicly available data on recent funding rounds or leadership changes.
- Likely ongoing product enhancements focusing on AI capabilities and cloud scalability.
- Potential partnerships with security integrators or cloud providers to expand market reach.
- May have secured pilot projects or early adopters in commercial or industrial sectors.

### Relevant Industry Trends
- **Macro trends:**
  - Increasing use of AI and machine learning in physical security.
  - Shift towards cloud-managed video surveillance systems.
  - Rising importance of cybersecurity in IoT and connected devices.
- **Niche trends:**
  - Demand for video analytics that support operational efficiency beyond security (e.g., retail analytics).
  - Growing interest in privacy-preserving AI technologies.
  - Integration of video security with broader smart building and IoT ecosystems.

### Sales Opportunities
- **Strategic angles for urgency or interest:**
  - Highlight cost savings and risk reduction from AI-powered automated monitoring.
  - Emphasize ease of integration with existing camera infrastructure to reduce upgrade friction.
  - Leverage industry trends around cloud migration and AI adoption to position Spot AI as a future-proof solution.
  - Target companies facing regulatory compliance pressures needing advanced video analytics.
  - Use recent market shifts (e.g., increased security budgets post-pandemic) to create urgency.
  - Offer pilot programs or proof-of-concept trials to demonstrate ROI and build trust.
  - Personalize outreach by referencing prospect’s current security challenges or recent company news (e.g., expansions, funding).

---

This report synthesizes typical market intelligence and sales prospecting best practices for AI camera security companies, as direct public data on Spot AI is limited. For prospecting, focus on personalized, multi-channel outreach emphasizing Spot AI’s AI-driven differentiation and alignment with evolving security needs[1][2][3][4][5].

fake_customer_account.content:
Customer Account: The customer is Quantum Logistics, a large-scale logistics and supply chain company with over 5,000 employees and numerous warehouses and distribution centers across the US. They manage the transportation and storage of a wide variety of goods, making security a paramount concern for them.

Internal Champion: The champion within Quantum Logistics is David Thompson, the Head of Security. He has over 15 years of experience in corporate security and is a strong advocate for leveraging technology to enhance security operations. His main goals are to reduce security breaches, increase efficiency, and maintain compliance with regulatory standards. His current pain points involve high costs and inefficiencies in manually monitoring numerous video surveillance feeds, along with the challenge of quickly extracting actionable insights from large volumes of video data.

Quantum Logistics has already purchased a small number of Spot AI's AI-powered security cameras and is using them in a few of their warehouses. They are impressed with the efficiency and accuracy of the AI threat detection and the reduction in false alarms. 

However, they have not yet fully integrated the system with their existing security infrastructure. They could benefit from expanding the use of Spot AI's cameras to all their locations and leveraging the cloud-based video storage and analytics to manage and analyze video data more efficiently. 

Expansion Opportunity: The opportunity for Spot AI lies in demonstrating the scalability and integration capabilities of their solution to Quantum Logistics. By showing how their product can seamlessly blend with the existing security setup and scale across all locations, Spot AI can position themselves as a comprehensive, technology-driven solution for Quantum Logistics' security challenges. Further, by showcasing their advanced analytics capabilities, they can help Quantum Logistics extract more value from their video data, turning it into actionable insights for improved security operations.
